meanings.definition: A structure used for storing corn.
meanings.sent1: The farmer stored his corn in the corncrib.
meanings.sent2: The old wooden corncrib stood in the field.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon thought the corncrib was a cozy home.
meanings.sent4: The corncrib loomed like a giant box in the farmyard.
meanings.sent5: The corncrib smelled of sweet corn on a sunny day.

meanings.definition: To store corn in a corncrib.
meanings.sent1: The farmer will corncrib the harvest next week.
meanings.sent2: She decided to corncrib the freshly picked corn.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to corncrib imaginary corn in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: He corncribbed the corn with care, ensuring it stayed fresh.
meanings.sent5: Corncribbing the corn was hard work, but satisfying.

meanings.definition: The act of building or maintaining a corncrib.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter's specialty was constructing a corncrib.
meanings.sent2: Building a sturdy corncrib requires skilled craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated the completion of the new corncrib.
meanings.sent4: Maintaining the corncrib was a labor of love for the farmer.
meanings.sent5: The corncrib construction project was a community effort.
